Control Name: 2.1.4 Features and development tasks for the application are prioritized and executed on in a consistent fashion.
Control Statement: It is important to understand how business features are prioritized relative to engineering fundamentals, especially if operations is a separate function.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 2.1 Have you identified and planned out the roles and responsibilities to ensure your workload follows operational excellence best practices?
control_attributes.Control: 2.1.4 Features and development tasks for the application are prioritized and executed on in a consistent fashion.
